name: ugirishm
cooked:
Hi,

I am trying to establish a Bangalore Branch of OSHWA and conduct many OSH activities (including building OSH Labs). Email to info@oshwa.org requesting list of members in Bangalore has not resulted in a response. Hence requesting members from Bangalore to contact me on ugirishm at yahoo dot com, so that we can start working on establishing the Bangalore Branch of OSHWA.

Thanks,
Girish
